title: Donate us by recharging your Mobile DTH DataCard
stanzas:
You know for sure that we keep updating with latest tamil song lyrics and we are spending more time to post lyrics of Tamil songs with English Translation. If you think we deserve something for these efforts, kindly recharge your mobile DTH or DataCard using below link and support us. 

Just recharge when you want to, as you do for basic need, but with the below link and support us. We will get a small amount commission :) . Thank you so much for your support friends.
Let us know your feedback about our site by commenting on this page.
